contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Luxurious and incredibly soft, these cashmere socks make it feel like you're walking on clouds. Let them carry you from your home floors to your everyday walks. Made to be worn in and out of bed!
contentfulProduct.title: Cashmere Trouser Sock

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

Luxurious and incredibly soft, these women's cashmere socks make it feel like you're walking on clouds. Let them carry you from your home floors to your everyday walks. Made to be worn in and out of bed!
Lightweight and breathable while also keeping your feet super warm
Wide rib with fine-rib cuffs and seamless toe
Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
Made with high-quality fibers which are washed, carded, and spun into soft two-ply yarns twisted to resist pilling
Material: 85% Cashmere, 13% Polyester, 2% Spandex
Origin: Zhuji, China

Hand wash using cold water and neutral soap or baby shampoo. Rinse out without rubbing and lay flat to dry at room temperature, avoiding sunlight. Iron at low temperature, using pressing cloth. Do not bleach. If you prefer to dry clean, please ask for delicate detergent.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Lightweight and breathable while also keeping your feet super warm
  • Wide rib with fine-rib cuffs and seamless toe
  • Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
  • Made with high-quality fibers which are washed, carded, and spun into soft two-ply yarns twisted to resist pilling
  • Material: 85% Cashmere, 13% Polyester, 2% Spandex
  • Origin: Zhuji, China
